nodes.text: The Legacy was a model of speeder bike produced by Praxon during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The Praxon Legacy was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on June 9, 2015 as one of the items in the Mid Rim Explorer's Pack on the Cartel Market.
